page.title: 04MILTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: On the 15th July 1959, the mayor of Newport,Councillor Edwin Aston laid the Foundation Stone of our school,which was named Milton Junior school.It is a state school,run by the Government and the local authority. Most of our teachers are in the National Union of Teachers(N.U.T.).One is in the National Association of School Masters and Union of Women Teachers(N.A.S./U.W.T.) and one isn't in any union. The class teacher who has been here the least length of time has been here for seven years and the longest for over 20 years.Our school which has children from 7 years to 11 years of age has been divided into 7 classes since a teacher retired last month after twenty-one years at this school.
